pages.title: Cooling
pages.text: Cost: Spell + Ice$(br2)Max Level: 1$(br2)XP Cost: 10$(br2)A simple spell to cast, this spell will put out blocks or entities on fire or un-light blocks that are Lit (E.g. Campfires)

When you cast the spell, a freezing spell projectile will be thrown from your scroll. Upon the projectile striking an entity, it will cool down any flames that may surround them.$(br)When striking a block, if it is lit or on fire, the cooling hit from your spell will put it out in a second
